name: Big Thunder Mountain
theme: Race through a gold mining town on a runaway mine train with an underwater tunnel finale.
short_description: A thrilling mine train coaster on an island surrounded by Rivers of the Far West.

name: Phantom Manor
theme: Explore a gothic Victorian mansion haunted by the Phantom and his tragic bride in this darker Haunted Mansion.
short_description: A spooky dark ride through a haunted manor with a unique European twist.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean
theme: Sail through pirate-infested Caribbean waters featuring Captain Jack Sparrow and Audio-Animatronics.
short_description: A boat ride through pirate adventures with multiple drops and elaborate scenes.

name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Peril
theme: Race through ancient ruins on a runaway mine cart featuring a 360-degree loop.
short_description: An intense outdoor looping coaster through an archaeological dig site.

name: Star Wars Hyperspace Mountain
theme: Join the Rebel Alliance in a high-speed battle through space with inversions and on-board audio.
short_description: An intense indoor roller coaster with loops themed to Star Wars space battles.

name: Avengers Assemble: Flight Force
theme: Join Iron Man and Captain Marvel on a high-speed mission featuring inversions and launches.
short_description: A thrilling indoor launched coaster with loops in Avengers Campus.

name: Spider-Man W.E.B. Adventure
theme: Help Spider-Man capture Spider-Bots using web-slinging hand gestures in this interactive 3D attraction.
short_description: An interactive dark ride where guests sling webs with hand motions.

name: Buzz Lightyear Laser Blast
theme: Join Buzz Lightyear to defeat Emperor Zurg by shooting targets with laser cannons.
short_description: An interactive shooting dark ride through space with competitive scoring.

name: Star Tours: The Adventures Continue
theme: A 3D flight simulator with randomized Star Wars adventures across multiple planets.
short_description: A motion simulator journey through Star Wars locations with multiple story paths.

name: Autopia
theme: Drive your own futuristic car along a scenic highway through Discoveryland.
short_description: A guided car ride where guests control gas-powered vehicles on a track.

name: Orbitron
theme: Pilot a rocket ship through the solar system controlling your altitude as you orbit.
short_description: A futuristic spinning rocket ride with guest-controlled height.

name: Peter Pan's Flight
theme: Fly over London and Neverland in pirate galleons suspended from above.
short_description: A classic flying dark ride through the story of Peter Pan.

name: Blanche-Neige et les Sept Nains (Snow White)
theme: Journey through Snow White's tale with the Evil Queen and the Seven Dwarfs.
short_description: A dark ride retelling the classic Snow White fairy tale.

name: Les Voyages de Pinocchio (Pinocchio's Journey)
theme: Follow Pinocchio's adventures from puppet to real boy through Pleasure Island and beyond.
short_description: A charming dark ride through Pinocchio's story.

name: Alice's Curious Labyrinth
theme: Navigate through a hedge maze leading to the Queen of Hearts' castle with interactive surprises.
short_description: A walk-through maze attraction themed to Alice in Wonderland.

name: Mad Hatter's Tea Cups
theme: Spin wildly in oversized teacups at the Mad Hatter's unbirthday party.
short_description: A classic spinning teacup ride from Alice in Wonderland.

name: Dumbo the Flying Elephant
theme: Soar above Fantasyland in Dumbo's flying circus with altitude control.
short_description: A classic flying elephant spinner for all ages.

name: Casey Jr. – le Petit Train du Cirque
theme: Ride aboard Casey Jr. through Storybook Land with miniature scenes from Disney films.
short_description: A scenic train ride through miniature Disney story settings.

name: Le Carrousel de Lancelot
theme: A medieval carousel featuring ornate horses and chariots beneath Sleeping Beauty Castle.
short_description: A beautiful Renaissance-style carousel with hand-carved horses.

name: it's a small world
theme: A boat cruise celebrating cultures worldwide with singing dolls and the iconic theme song.
short_description: A gentle boat ride through scenes of children from around the world.

name: La Tanière du Dragon (Dragon's Lair)
theme: Explore the dungeons beneath Sleeping Beauty Castle and encounter a massive animatronic dragon.
short_description: A walk-through attraction featuring an impressive Audio-Animatronic dragon.

name: Disneyland Railroad
theme: A scenic steam train tour around the entire park with stops in four themed lands.
short_description: A grand circle tour of the park aboard authentic steam locomotives.

name: Main Street Vehicles
theme: Ride vintage turn-of-the-century vehicles down Main Street including horse-drawn streetcars.
short_description: Historic vehicle transportation along Main Street U.S.A.

name: Thunder Mesa Riverboat Landing
theme: Cruise around the Rivers of the Far West on a paddle wheel steamboat.
short_description: A leisurely riverboat voyage around Frontierland's waterways.

name: Pocahontas Indian Village
theme: An interactive playground inspired by Pocahontas with climbing structures and trails.
short_description: A wilderness-themed play area for children.

name: Rustler Roundup Shootin' Gallery
theme: Test your marksmanship at this Old West shooting gallery with moving targets.
short_description: An interactive shooting gallery in a Western town setting.

name: Adventure Isle
theme: Explore caves, suspension bridges, and Captain Hook's pirate ship on a tropical island.
short_description: An interactive island adventure with caves and walkways to explore.

name: La Cabane des Robinson (Swiss Family Treehouse)
theme: Climb through the elaborate treehouse home of the shipwrecked Swiss Family Robinson.
short_description: A walk-through attraction in a massive artificial tree.

name: Disney Illuminations
theme: A nighttime spectacular featuring fireworks, projections, fountains, and lasers on Sleeping Beauty Castle.
short_description: Disneyland Paris' premier nighttime show with castle projections and pyrotechnics.

name: Disney Stars on Parade
theme: A vibrant daytime parade featuring Disney characters on elaborate floats celebrating imagination.
short_description: The park's signature daytime parade with spectacular floats and performers.

name: Mickey and the Magician
theme: A Broadway-style stage show where Mickey learns magic alongside beloved Disney characters.
short_description: A spectacular theatrical production featuring Mickey Mouse and Disney classics.
